text: āṉāl avarkaḷ (ippōtaṉaiyaip) puṟakkaṇittārkaḷ; ākavē, al arim (eṉṉum perum aṇaiyai uṭaikkum) kaṭum piravākattai avarkaḷ mītu aṉuppiṉōm, iṉṉum (cuvai mikka kaṉikaḷaik koṇṭa) avarkaḷuṭaiya iru tōppukaḷai kacappum puḷippumuḷḷa paḻaṅkaḷuṭaiya maraṅkaḷum, cila ilantai maraṅkaḷum uṭaiya iru tōṭṭaṅkaḷāka māṟṟiṉōm
